QuestData.Title: Meet with Ezul'aan
QuestData.Description: Ezul'aan from the Training Hall in Stormwind has sent a message for you. He wants to speak with you the next time you're in the city. The Training Hall is located in Stormwind's Old Town District.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ezul'aan at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Ezul'aan at the Training Hall in Stormwind.
